input.sentences: my visit to location was fun and colorful .
i took a picture with some school girls . they thought it would be funny .

output.sentences: The friends visited a colorful location and had fun.
They visited the temples of the religion in that particular country.
While visiting, one man had his picture made with two school girls.
The temple was perched atop the ground by the water.
